question_text: Which of the following are valid troubleshooting steps for a wired network printer that appears offline? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Check for link lights at the printer’s network port
Verify printer is on the same VLAN/subnet
Confirm that the print server recognizes the IP address
correct_answer: Check for link lights at the printer’s network port
Verify printer is on the same VLAN/subnet
Confirm that the print server recognizes the IP address
explanation: These are all valid advanced checks for diagnosing a non-responsive wired printer at the network level.
